titleStmt.title: Charitable constructions of the designe of the trustees usually sitting at Sadlers-Hall. For brevity sake set downe in questions and answers. And written and published to prevent the sinne of rash judging. By a well-wisher to the work.
titleStmt.author: Ibbitson, Robert.

titleStmt.title: Charitable constructions of the designe of the trustees usually sitting at Sadlers-Hall. For brevity sake set downe in questions and answers. And written and published to prevent the sinne of rash judging. By a well-wisher to the work.
titleStmt.author: Ibbitson, Robert.

notesStmt.note: A well-wisher to the work = Robert Ibbitson. Cf. Wing.
Identified as Wing C2065 on UMI microfilm set "Early English books, 1641-1700".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
